plays.text: Penalty to Travis Green 2 minutes for Roughing Andrei Markov
Penalty to Tomas Plekanec 2 minutes for Slashing Glen Murray
Penalty to Mike Komisarek 2 minutes for Crosschecking Wayne Primeau
Penalty to Craig Rivet 2 minutes for Hooking Patrice Bergeron
Penalty to Mike Komisarek 2 minutes for Interference P.J. Axelsson
Penalty to Andrei Markov 2 minutes for Holding Patrice Bergeron
Penalty to Saku Koivu 2 minutes for Hooking Brad Boyes
Penalty to Wayne Primeau 2 minutes for Tripping Saku Koivu
Penalty to Andrew Alberts 2 minutes for Hooking Richard Zednik
Goal scored by Andrei Markov assisted by Alexei Kovalev
Penalty to Nick Boynton 2 minutes for Hooking Alexei Kovalev
Penalty to Craig Rivet 2 minutes for Throwing the Stick(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Sheldon Souray unassisted
